thread.title: We Trained Like Cirque Du Soleil Performers And It Was Freaking Hard
thread.title_full: We Trained Like Cirque Du Soleil Performers And It Was Freaking Hard

author: Michelle Khare, Jordan Shalhoub
title: We Trained Like Cirque Du Soleil Performers And It Was Freaking Hard
text:
View this image › 
pinterest.com ID: 9881818 Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=Odejm7-zmx4 . BuzzFeedBlue / Via youtube.com ID: 9881414 3. On the first day we met our coaches: Aloysia Gavre (aerial choreographer and Cirque Du Soleil alum) and Lauren Macleod (professional aerialist) from Cirque School LA . View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue They were complete and total badasses.
ID: 9881893 4. And within the first half hour, we were already upside down on a trapeze. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue We quickly realized they were giving us the real deal, no joke.
ID: 9881901 5. The first day was a bit of a struggle, getting used to having a metal pole wedged in very uncomfortable and *intimate* places. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 9881860 6. As the week progressed, not only was the physical aspect of training very tiring, but also, we were experiencing different types of pain and bruising on our hands and the backs of our knees. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 9881904 View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue “Getting back on the trapeze for the second day was very painful.”
ID: 9881909 8. As we started to get *somewhat* comfortable flying around in the air, they pulled a fast one on us on day three — our final act was to SHARE a double’s trapeze. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue BOTH OF US! ON THAT TINY-ASS THING!
ID: 9881914 9. As the training continued, fatigue set in, but we had to keep pushing. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 9881916 10. Even on the final performance day, Aloysia was wary about how we’d do. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 9881917 11. We were so nervous to perform in front of our coworkers, with all the lights and makeup and pressure. But it turned out pretty badass. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 9881920 12. We learned so much about teamwork and have an INCREDIBLE amount of respect for the people who train their entire lives for these performances. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 9881925 13. We were thankful for the chance to fulfill this childhood dream as adults. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 9881934 14. Until next time! View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 9881928
